traditional_dishes.description: Czech national dish of marinated beef sirloin with cream sauce, bread dumplings, and cranberry sauce. A must-try comfort food.
Hearty beef stew with onions, paprika, and Czech bread dumplings. Perfect for cold mountain weather.
Breaded and fried pork or chicken cutlet, typically served with potato salad or boiled potatoes.

drinks.name: Czech Beer
drinks.description: Czech Republic has the highest beer consumption per capita. Try Pilsner Urquell, Budvar, or local Liberec brewery beers.

drinks.name: Becherovka
drinks.description: Traditional Czech herbal liqueur from nearby Karlovy Vary, often served as a digestif or in cocktails.

drinks.name: Slivovice
drinks.description: Traditional plum brandy, popular throughout Czech Republic and often homemade in rural areas.
